Winter's Kiss.name: Winter's Kiss
Winter's Kiss.fullText:
Bralani Wintersoul Attack 11Winter's Kiss

Snow flies and solidifies around your opponent, binding it in a frigid embrace.

Encounter        Cold
Standard Action      Ranged 5

Attack: Your highest ability modifier + 6 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Your highest ability modifier + 9 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 1d10 + your highest ability modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Aftereffect: The target takes 5 cold damage and is slowed until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 384, page(s) 63.
Winter's Kiss.flavor: Snow flies and solidifies around your opponent, binding it in a frigid embrace.
Winter's Kiss.attack:
Your highest ability modifier + 6 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Your highest ability modifier + 9 vs. Fortitude
Winter's Kiss.onHit: 1d10 + your highest ability modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Winter's Kiss.aftereffect: The target takes 5 cold damage and is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Blizzard Blast.name: Blizzard Blast
Blizzard Blast.fullText:
Bralani Wintersoul Attack 20Blizzard Blast

Snow and ice explodes from your fingertips to scatter your foes and bind them with ice.

Daily        Cold, Teleportation
Standard Action      Close blast 5

Target: Each creature in the blast

Attack: Your highest ability modifier + 9 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 3d6 + your highest ability modifier cold damage, and the target is blinded and immobilized (save ends both).

Miss: Half damage, and until the end of your turn the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and is slowed.

Effect: You teleport to any square within the blast.


Published in Dragon Magazine 384, page(s) 63.
Blizzard Blast.flavor: Snow and ice explodes from your fingertips to scatter your foes and bind them with ice.
Blizzard Blast.attack: Your highest ability modifier + 9 vs. Fortitude
Blizzard Blast.onHit: 3d6 + your highest ability modifier cold damage, and the target is blinded and immobilized (save ends both).
Blizzard Blast.onMiss: Half damage, and until the end of your turn the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and is slowed.
Blizzard Blast.effect: You teleport to any square within the blast.

Snowfall.name: Snowfall
Snowfall.fullText:
Bralani Wintersoul Utility 12Snowfall

The enemy’s attack causes you to fly apart in a cloud of swirling snow.

Encounter        Zone
Immediate Reaction      Close burst 2

Trigger: You are damaged by an attack

Effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Squares in the zone are lightly obscured. While you are in the zone, you have concealment and insubstantial.


Published in Dragon Magazine 384, page(s) 63.
Snowfall.flavor: The enemy’s attack causes you to fly apart in a cloud of swirling snow.
Snowfall.trigger: You are damaged by an attack
Snowfall.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Squares in the zone are lightly obscured. While you are in the zone, you have concealment and insubstantial.
